# Resource (rootly_workflow_task_invite_to_slack_channel_pagerduty)

Manages workflow invite_to_slack_channel_pagerduty task.

## Example Usage

```
resource "rootly_workflow_task_invite_to_slack_channel_pagerduty" "foo" {
  name = "bar"
}
```
